text: allāhaninda granthavannu, adhikāravannu mattu dūtasthānavannu paḍediruva yāva manuṣyanū janaroḍane ‘‘nīvu allāhanannu biṭṭu nanna dāsarāgiri’’ endu khaṇḍita hēḷalāranu. Avanantu ‘‘divya granthavannu (itararige) kalisuttiruva mattu svataḥ adannu ōduttiruva nīvu dēvara niṣṭhāvanta dāsarāgiri’’ endē hēḷuvanu
